amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to eliminating deductions for corporate compensation in excess of $1,000,000.

vote.text: Amendment SA 919 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 54. Record Vote Number: 127.

action.text: Amendment SA 919 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Reed. (consideration: CR S1995-1997, S2009; text: CR S1996) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to eliminating deductions for corporate compensation in excess of $1,000,000.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 919 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 54. Record Vote Number: 127.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 919 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 54. Record Vote Number: 127.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 919 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Reed.
